identifier: builders surplus yee haa - haltom city, texas:fort worth, tx

data.name: Builders Surplus Yee Haa - Haltom City, Texas
data.address: 5832 E Belknap St, Haltom City, TX 76117

reviews.text: Builder surplus was amazing!. Great customer service, understood what I needed and got together and completely took care of my building needs. I purchased one double iron door, one double mahogany door and a single mahogany door. And they beat everybody’s price on that combination. Tim Buck, the manager and Agustin were on top of it! Kaylyn took care of the rest!  Great day!

Date of transaction 10.15.25 Door double patio doors and front door We visited the store on 10.15 and worked with sales person Adam. We explained to him exactly what we wanted and he said we needed a Left handle door..so we purchased the doors and had the contractor pick up the doors on 10/21/25. As the contractors were installing the doors i noticed the door was the wrong door and the door handle was on the right and not the left. The the contractors are now charging 200.00 for them to exchange

Ridge was amazingly helpful, patient, and walk me through a few different ideas to get the perfect solution for my project. If you want doors, they have absolutely everything you need. From Iron to mahogany, they have you covered. Fantastic crew that works there, the most helpful and supportive in addition to great inventory. Can't think Ridge enough for giving me the assistance I needed this morning, and helping me load the Beast of a solid mahogany door into the truck. WILL DO BUSINESS here et

I bought 2 beautiful iron doors at the end of October 2025 for my home and was assisted by Augustine. He showed me individual doors and finishes and helped me choose a matching pair of double patio and entry doors. He also assisted me with the technical advice about the installation. 100% happy with my purchase for the substantially lower price and the excellent customer service after the sale and knowledgeable salespeople. Will definitely recommend Builder's Supply for doors, replacement window

Jaimie J went above and beyond to help me build the perfect cabinet design for my master bath remodel. Even when I ran into problems, she immediately found the solution and had me back on track. I cannot say enough good things about my experience. Jamie excels at her job. I would give her 10 stars if it was an option.

Amazing selection and the best customer service around. Had a project that needed extra help and they went above and beyond to help me secure flooring that was no longer in stock. No I'll have the staircase of my dreams that will match the floor we put in 2 years ago. We'll always ship here first.

Was able to re tile my shower with this tile I found here. With the help of a gentleman named Augustin, who gave me a good idea and tips on how to install it since I DIY it myself, He was a lot of help in deciding what to go with since the have a lot of selection of tile to choose from at grate prices.
Thanks again for your help Augustin

Jaimie was incredibly helpful throughout the entire kitchen design process. She listened to what I needed, offered great suggestions, and made everything feel easy and stress-free. Her eye for detail and thoughtful approach led to a beautiful, functional kitchen that I absolutely love. Highly recommend!

Robert (tall guy - human ladder) is spectacular.   He makes buying cabinets so easy.  I have been on 3 times buying cabinets for 1 project and its a breeze.  I cant find the quality or price anywhere else.  They even built one on site...in a hot minute for me...an hour before closing....without blinking an eye....will return for my next cabinet needs.

Went to buy a freestanding bathtub and was unsure of what size to get.  Antolin was magnificent!!  He got bathtubs for me to demo.  He was great.  Everyone was so friendly and professional.  I highly recommend this place for your home reno projects .
Antonio helped us with getting doors for our house. He was very patient and helpful. We had an amazing experience!

I can't thank Jaimie enough for her support in bringing my new kitchen to life! She truly made a difference during the entire design process, and I felt guided and understood every step of the way.❤️❤️

Susan was incredibly helpful. Weird store and definitely overpacked. Some prices and great while others are incredibly high. Don't take your family unless you shop outside. Again, no room.
As an example I bought a window and it was in the "back yard" all exposed to weather. All labels washed off and dirt was on them all. It looked totally used not new, however I was able to negotiate a better price.

We went in to get a barn door & had great help from Ridge! He helped us determine the size we needed for our home, and was able to find it out back for us quickly. He pointed us towards the hardware we needed, too. Even gave us extra tips to help us make the door look great! Thanks Ridge
Jaime helped me design my dream kitchen and picked out the perfect doors to go with my space! Super helpful and I will be returning, ask for Jaime!
JR was helpful throughout the whole process. He build a custom door and it was everything I wanted. 10/10 would recommend.

I want to extend my sincere thanks to Tim Buck for his incredible kindness and attentiveness when I needed help finding a door. What might seem like a small gesture to some truly made a big difference to me. He went out of his way to guide me without hesitation, showing not only great awareness but also genuine consideration for someone in need!
Antolin was a great help with getting us cabinets today. I highly recommend him if you need help.

Ridge is a great guy helped me find the selection of exterior door that I wanted, a 36 by 80 with multiple options. I will be coming up and purchasing my doors from him soon!  Great store and great staff
Finally found an amazing place for quality doors, JR is the best in the business if you want an outstanding product! Will shop here again
